Inikah Air Terjun Tercantik Dunia?
06 Nov 2019, 23:10 by Bonauli


Air terjun Seljalandsfoss di Islandia. (Foto: iStock)

Reykjavik - Air terjun kerap jadi destinasi wisata pelepas penat bagi wisatawan. Nah di negara ini, air terjunnya bukan cuma cantik banget tapi juga beda dari yang lainnya.Seljalandsfoss, begitu nama air terjun ini. Mungkin nama air terjun yang berada di Islandia tak mudah dilafalkan, tapi pesonanya sudah pasti tak terbantahkan. Diintip dari Situs resmi Islandia, Seljalandsfoss sendiri terletak di Pantai Selatan Islandia.Mari mengagumi lebih dekat air terjun setinggi 60 meter ini. Seljalandsfoss adalah bagian dari Sungai Seljalandsa. Sungai ini juga menjadi aliran dari gletser Eyjafjallajokull. Jadi bisa dibilang, Seljalandsfoss adalah lelehan gletser. Wih!


Air terjun Seljalandsfoss di Islandia. (Foto: iStock)

Air terjun Seljalandsfoss memiliki sebuah gua luas di balik guyuran airnya. Dari dalam gua, pemandangan yang dihasilkan sungguh istimewa. Layaknya jatuh ke dalam lubang, air terjun ini menawarkan pemandangan yang berbeda. Sambil main basah-basahan di kolam gua, wisatawan bisa menikmati sunset di seberang air terjun. Pemandangan ini menjadi yang paling populer di Islandia.Kerennya lagi, air terjun ini tak pernah membosankan karena punya pemandangan berbeda tiap musimnya. Saat musim panas, kamu akan dijamu dengan pemandangan bunga-bunga liar yang bermekaran di sisi air terjun. Di musim dingin ada salju yang menutupi pinggiran air terjun. Awas licin!


Seljalandsfoss

Nah, yang paling ditunggu di sini ketika musim dingin tiba adalah kemunculan aurora di langit yang bikin pemandangan air terjun jadi makin cantik. Ini adalah dua musim favorit wisatawan.Untuk bisa ke air terjun cantik ini, kamu bisa berkendara dari Reykjavik selama dua jam. Air terjun ini diakses melalui pertanian Seljaland di sepanjang Ring Road utama Islandia.Kalau liburan ke sini, jangan lupa untuk bawa baju ganti dan gadget anti air untuk menyempurnakan liburan ya!

Is this the World's Most Beautiful Waterfall?
Nov 6 2019, 23:10 by Bonauli


Seljalandsfoss waterfall in Iceland. (Photo: iStock)

Reykjavik - Waterfalls often become fatigue relief tourist destinations for tourists. Now in this country, the waterfall is not only very beautiful but also different from the others. Seljalandsfoss, so the name of this waterfall. Maybe the name of the waterfall in Iceland is not easy to pronounce, but the charm is certainly undeniable. Peeped from the official Icelandic website, Seljalandsfoss itself is located on the South Coast of Iceland. Let's admire the 60 meter high waterfall. Seljalandsfoss is part of the Seljalandsa River. This river is also the flow of the Eyjafjallajokull glacier. So you could say, Seljalandsfoss is glacial melt. Wow!


Seljalandsfoss waterfall in Iceland. (Photo: iStock)

Seljalandsfoss waterfall has a large cave behind the splash of water. From inside the cave, the scenery produced was truly special. Like falling into a hole, this waterfall offers a different view. While playing wet in the cave pool, tourists can enjoy the sunset across the waterfall. This scenery is the most popular in Iceland. Cool again, this waterfall is never boring because it has a different view each season. In the summer, you will be treated to views of wild flowers that bloom on the side of the waterfall. In winter there is snow covering the edges of the waterfall. Watch out slippery!


Seljalandsfoss

Well, the most awaited here when winter arrives is the appearance of auroras in the sky which makes the waterfall view even more beautiful. These are two favorite tourist seasons. To get to this beautiful waterfall, you can drive from Reykjavik for two hours. This waterfall is accessed via the Seljaland farm along Iceland's main Ring Road. If it's a vacation here, don't forget to bring a change of clothes and waterproof gadgets to perfect the holiday!
